rows.label: tev024001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ivory about the residential district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ivory if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Ivory about the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Ivory what she intends to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Ivory about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0001
rows.name:
This area is the residential district, where most of the
support crew lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0002
rows.name:
The idea was to live in Earth-like comfort no matter
what planet we landed on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0003
rows.name:
Its specific design and layout were modeled after
Beverly Hills. It actually kind of captures that vibe,
don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0008
rows.name:
Do you know Sullivan, the botanist at the integrated
production plant in the industrial district?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0009
rows.name:
I heard she was looking for a BLADE to help her with
a project. I wonder if she found anyone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm sure she was looking for someone to bring her
lots of plants she could keep as preservation samples
and display samples and blah de blah blah blah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'll admit that I prefer flowers to people, but even I'm
stunned by how much Sullivan loves plants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0020
rows.name:
A line of beautiful houses in a sea of green grass...
Normally, we'd be able to hear the happy voices of
children at play...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0021
rows.name:
But that will have to wait until we recover the Lifehold
Core. So I'm counting on you to get it, friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0022
rows.name:
I'll keep doing my part by planting flowers and
trimming trees so everything's ready for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0028
rows.name:
We human beings are like flowersâ€”no matter how
often we get stomped on, we always pop back up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0029
rows.name:
As for me, I suppose all I can do now is work hard
to keep all of the district's gardens looking nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0030
rows.name:
But when we reclaim the Lifehold Core, there's a
different job that I want to do...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0031
rows.name:
I want to babysit for the kids!
I used to do that all the time back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0032
rows.name:
Imagine helping to raise the first generation of people
ever born on Mira! What job could possibly beat that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0040
rows.name:
I received some samples of Miran flowers from Sullivan
the botanist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0041
rows.name:
But two of the three samples weren't flowers at all!
They were indigens disguising themselves as plants![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0042
rows.name:
I had to call the Mediators for help, and it ended up
being this whole big...thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0043
rows.name:
But when I told Sullivan, she was all, "Oh nooo,
my precious display sample and propaganda sample!"
Seriously, that was all she cared about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024001_MSG0044
rows.name:
It's like they don't even let you be a scientist if you
have a single lick of common sense.[ST:wait ]
